title: Allows certain certified lactation consultants to purchase hypodermic syringes
summary: Allows board certified lactation consultants, certified by the international board of lactation consultant examiners, to purchase hypodermic syringes.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2230

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 14, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. M. MILLER -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M. of A. BING,
         CORWIN,  GIBSON, MILLMAN, MONTESANO, SAYWARD, SCHIMEL -- read once and
         referred to the Committee on Health

       AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to  allowing  certain
         lactation consultants to purchase hypodermic syringes

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 3381 of the public health law is amended by  adding
    2  a new subdivision 1-a to read as follows:
    3    1-A. IT SHALL BE UNLAWFUL FOR ANY PERSON TO SELL OR FURNISH TO ANOTHER
    4  PERSON OR PERSONS, A HYPODERMIC SYRINGE, UNLESS SUCH PERSON IS SPECIFIED
    5  IN  SUBDIVISION  ONE OF THIS SECTION, EXCEPT TO A BOARD CERTIFIED LACTA-
    6  TION CONSULTANT, CERTIFIED  BY  THE  INTERNATIONAL  BOARD  OF  LACTATION
    7  CONSULTANT EXAMINERS.
    8    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD04349-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to allowing certain lactation consultants to purchase hypodermic syringes
